chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML
chunks.text: In this video, we will know what are forms and what is the input tag in the form.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML
chunks.text: Using a form is a very important element of some websites because through the form, you submit data from client to server.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML
chunks.text: These are the forms that you see on contact pages, Google forms or inquiry forms.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML
chunks.text: The date and time to go to the flight or railway ticket, we put all these details, they also submit through the HTML forms.

text: In this video, we will know what are forms and what is the input tag in the form. Using a form is a very important element of some websites because through the form, you submit data from client to server. These are the forms that you see on contact pages, Google forms or inquiry forms. The date and time to go to the flight or railway ticket, we put all these details, they also submit through the HTML forms. In the last video, very few people liked it, I will request you to like this video with high energy so that we can maintain high energy throughout the course. So let's go to the computer screen, we will see about the forms, we will see about the input tags and we will see some best practices. Let's roll the intro. So guys I have come to my computer screen and now see I am going to make a folder here which I am going to name video6 because this is the sixth video. I will do it with open with code, I have already told you all this. And here I am going to make index.html and I will put an exclamation mark in it and what I will do is I will wrap the view word, I will turn on the screen cast mode and you will see here I will write forms let's learn it. So I have set the title of this forms page here and what happened by setting the title that the title will be visible on our page. Here I want to tell you a very important setting, show preview, many of you have pointed out to me in the comment that you have to click so many times, can you do something? Yes you can, click on the gear below, click on settings and after clicking on settings, what you do simply, write live preview here and we can actually set it such that whenever we click, it will open on the external browser. So now I will close everything, as soon as I click here, it will open on the external browser and I come to my browser and the playlist of the Sigma web development course is accessing it by clicking on the star and here on the bookmark. But now I want to tell you that as soon as we click here, you see it opened, so if you want this, then do this, but sometimes what happens is that you want to prefer side by side view and when you want to do that, when you are actually working on a design using HTML, CSS. So whenever you are working on design, you definitely want to see live previews here, which is why this extension was made and it was made different from the live server so that you can see the preview on the side. Now what we will do here, we will know about the forms, what is a form, you know the name, the form means that we fill the railway form and with that our reservation is done, along with that we fill the form of IIT JEE, the form of NEET, the form of any exam, so that our data can reach those who want it, so this is the form. HTML is a form tag, as soon as you enter the form, you will get the first question from you, what is the action of your form, get or post, I tell you a very quick difference between get request and post request, get request is a very simple request and post request is sent when we have to give a lot of data, like when our form is posted, then in most of the cases we will use post request and get request is a very simple request. Post request is that we have to tell the server something and that's it or we have to hit the server with a request but if you did not understand this now, that should be fine, there is no problem, because we will do this in detail later, so the form action is equal to post I have written here, now I can show some input tags inside it, input tag what are they, that what elements will come inside
